artist: Designer: Peter Phillips; Manufacturer: Heal's Fabrics
description: White ground; 3-1/2 circles formed by yellow, orange, red, purple and black rectangles
image_copyright: Â© Heal%27s Fabrics%2C London%2C Peter Phillips%2C 1974
markings: \'<- Top Heal\'s \'Highlight\' Designed by Peter Phillips\', \'Woven & Printed in England Terylene/Cotton Cool Iron top ->\', printed in white border to either side
text: Like Gabrielle Fountain's Equilibrium in this exhibition, Highlight employs an unabashedly broad range of bright colors. Phillips transitioned them from a reflective yellow to a bright fuchsia, creating a sense of three-dimensional, light-reflecting spherical forms, almost like a strand of dark pearls. The enlargement of geometric form in this textile renders a pixilated effect, which draws from the graphics of early videogames and computer designs. Highlight was printed in multiple other colorways, including one incorporating an eye-popping teal, purple and red.
title: Highlight
